tool_description: Textocat API enables scalable state-of-the-art NLP/search in your favorite language.
name: Textocat Beta
title: Textocat Beta

api_list.name: /status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://textocat-textocat-v1.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textocat-textocat-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://textocat-textocat-v1.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "textocat-textocat-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /entity/search
api_list.description: Full-text search over all the user's documents. Entity search is featured.

required_parameters.description: See http://docs.textocat.com/search-query-syntax.pdf for the description of the search query syntax.
